DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate real practice treatment Symbicort Turbuhaler 3 month asthma patient compliance .
DOC.brief_title: A 3-Month Non-Interventional Study Asthmatics Treatment With Symbicort® Turbuhaler®
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent 2 . Asthmatics prescribe Symbicort accord physician 's judgement 3 . Usage Symbicort follow local prescribe information 1 . Not involved plan conduct study ( applies AstraZeneca staff staff study site ) 2 . No previous enrolment present study
